metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1974 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernel's NFC corefunctionality due to a race condition between kobject creation and delete.This vulnerability allows a local attacker with CAP_NET_ADMIN privilege toleak kernel information.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
